name: Arctic Rose
description:
The past thought buried inflicts new wounds upon a forest village.

Artic Rose tells the tale of a Mother and Son going out for a hunt, and instead end up hunted.

This is what I managed to get done within the time limit. I noticed this jam a bit late so I had more like 25/26 days.

Credits:

VexedEnigma/PixelJustice - Character bases (POP horror)

Hellpug -Other pixel art and pixel editing, programming, animation. some sound effects.
